name: Lovux
description:
Lovux is a minimalist puzzle game where you try to break all glasses on the screen using different glass types and mechanics wisely. It offers a rich puzzle experience thanks to new mechanics added approximately every 15 levels.

Gameplay:

    • Discover the game on your own, no tutorials!
    • Break the whole line by activating the breakers
    • Create a line you will break by moving the glasses
    • Use breakers wisely
    • Use all 3 dimensions
    • Sometimes you'll have to think a bit

Features:

    • New mechanics added every 15 levels
    • 8 different mechanics in total
    • 125 levels (from simple to insufferably difficult)
    • Simple, relaxing, peaceful puzzle experience
    • Full HD in all resolutions
    • Smooth animations
    • Good game feel
    • Color themes
    • No text
    • Minimalist interface
    • Steam Achievements
    • Steam Cloud

Controls:

    • You can play the whole game using only your mouse!

Music and Sound Design by Emir Mahi Uysal <3
